alt_text: How To Claim Deluxe Edition Items .png
img_above_text:
There will be 7 items waiting for you there including a **Weapon, Armor set, and a Curio**. If you've purchased the Deluxe Edition after passing this point, just interact with the nearest Shrine to collect your items.
## What Do You Get in the Black Myth: Wukong Deluxe Edition?
img_below_text:
As mentioned, there are 7 items you can pick up from the Keeper's Shrine. Those are:
### Weapon

img_summary:
1. The image displays an in-game collection menu from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing items included in the Deluxe Edition. The highlighted item is the "Folk Opera Mask," part of the "Deluxe Edition Gifts." A total of seven items are visible, which can be collected at this point in the game.

2. The image serves to illustrate the process of collecting Deluxe Edition rewards, tying into the preceding and following text that describes the items available and their retrieval from the Keeper's Shrine.
